title: Manage Payload Data Rights
description: A university has an instrument on a NASA satellite. A mission manager must ensure the university gets their data while protecting the data rights of other instruments.

tasks.description: Review the data sharing agreements for all payloads on the satellite.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the data rights and access rules for each instrument team.

tasks.description: Configure the ground data system to automatically route the data from the university's instrument to their dedicated server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the data routing rules.

tasks.description: Verify that the university team can access their data and that they cannot access data from any other instruments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the access controls are working correctly.
